title: QuoteColo_Sean
author: QuoteColo_Sean
content: Hey everyone,My name is Sean and I work for the company QuoteColo. We are a no cost referral service that provides free, no obligation mining hosting quotes from pre-qualified miner hosting facilities in North America, China, Europe & Russia. We also offer ASICs for sale and have the ability to order any type of miner hardware that you require. If anyone is interested in our services, you can email either bob@quotecolo.com or sean@quotecolo.com and we'd be happy to help. Our website is https://www.quotecolo.com/ where you can also find more information. Thanks!
